<properties pageTitle="6f9dad7c-c654-4761-8eb5-071a214e5c42" description="71e993a2-7c45-4b3f-827b-af68fe6e4cf2" services="notification-hubs" documentationCenter="ios" authors="wesmc7777" manager="dwrede" editor=""/>

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block:
self.deviceInfo = [[DeviceInfo alloc] init];
[[UIApplication sharedApplication] registerForRemoteNotificationTypes: UIRemoteNotificationTypeAlert | UIRemoteNotificationTypeBadge | UIRemoteNotificationTypeSound];
DeviceInfo* deviceInfo = [(PushToUserAppDelegate*)[[UIApplication sharedApplication]delegate] deviceInfo]; Self.installationId.text = deviceInfo.installationId;
